Seniors surprised with yard signs. Local businesses placed signs in the front yards of the MCC Senior Class of 2020. Thank you to B&K Designs, Chandler Co-op, Minnwest Bank, Prahm Construction and Schmitz Grain for purchasing signs for the entire senior class. #seniorstrong2020 view image

The MCC Elementary Backpack Program has been providing weekend food packages to help families for the past 2 years. A HUGE shout out to our volunteers from Lake Sarah Baptist Church for helping us make deliveries and keep this program going. We couldn't do it without you! view image
